nodes.text: The Annex of Kespan, named after Gavail Kespan, was the oldest ruin on the planet of Sarkhai, which was on the verge of collapse by 3641 BBY. A Sarkhai guild asked the Sarkhai representative in the Galactic Republic Nadia Grell for permission from the Galactic Senate to demolish the ruin and build a new spaceport on its site.

The Annex of Kespan is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during Nadia Grell's companion storyline. The decision on whether to preserve or demolish the ruin is made by the player, who suggests the solution to Nadia.
